world.behavior

Class ArrowKeyControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.behavior.Behavior
      • world.behavior.ArrowKeyControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ArrowKeyControl
extends Behavior
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    class ArrowKeyControl needed to move an element in the world thanks to an arrow key
    See Also:
    Behavior, KeyListener
